channel.title: Lesser Chameleons on
channel.description: Recent content in Lesser Chameleons on

item.title: Bing (冰)
item.description: Great little girl we got from Frank Payne. I am a huge fan of her shoulder patches and her night sky pattern on the dark body sections. Her older sister, Violet, was our first female; however, we have not gotten any clutches from her yet. Bing is a sweetheart, and we hope to hatch our first clutches from her in 2021! Bing Bing1 Bing10 Bing11 Bing12 Bing13 Bing14 Bing2

item.title: Feng (风)
item.description: Another little girl we got from Frank Payne. She’s very healthy and vibrant with an nice dark background on her body. Feng Feng1 Feng10 Feng11 Feng12 Feng13 Feng14 Feng2 Feng3 Feng4 Feng5 Feng6 Feng7 Feng8 Feng9 Sire M1 Dam F3

item.title: Huo (火)
item.description: Beautiful female that we picked up from Kevin Stanford. She has a really nice pitch-black body with a fire tip on the top of her yellow streaks. Stunning specimen of this species! We were able to get a few healthy clutches from her and hope to produce our first clutch from them. She has been very fun to work with thus far. Huo Huo1 Huo2 Huo3 Huo4 Huo5 Huo6

item.title: Di (地)
item.description: Our first adult male from Frank Payne Di Sire M3 Dam F5

item.title: Lineage: Kevin Stanford Reptiles
item.description: Kevin Stanford Reptiles Kevin has some really interesting oranges on a lot of his female Furcifer minor. The lineage on Huo’s Sire Img 5681 Img 5683 Huo’s Dam Img 5679 Img 5680 Huo’s Grand Dam Img 5677 Img 5678

item.title: Lineage: Living Art by Frank Payne
item.description: Living Art by Frank Payne Brightflame Unknown Brightflame Brightflame1 Sire Canvas Sire (possibly Bolt/Marley) Dam Canvas Dam (possibly Marley or Outline’s daughter) Minors Sires M1, M3, M6, M20 Dams F3, F5, F8, F20
